attributes.action: to refrain from sending troops into a sovereign land, Nigeria.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He should solve his own problems at home, he's got alot. Nigerians can take care of themselves. when did he become the messiah? or is this still colonial time? so he values petrol more to human lives?

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
